alert.note: Alert for Central Brewster County; Chinati Mountains; Chisos Basin; Lower Brewster County; Marfa Plateau; Presidio Valley (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 25 at 3:15AM CST until February 27 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM SUNDAY TO MIDNIGHT CST SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 50 mph with gusts up to 70 mph expected. * WHERE...Rio Grande Valley, Chinati, Marfa Plateau, Central Brewster, and Chisos Basin. * WHEN...From 11 AM Sunday to midnight CST Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Central Brewster County; Chinati Mountains; Chisos Basin; Lower Brewster County; Marfa Plateau; Presidio Valley
